description: Surgically implanted in your hands and forearms are small hardlight projectors and a quantum computer designed to simplify engineering tasks to near trivial levels as well as creating temporary versions of the tools needed.
Begin or stop projecting your MACES unit's hardlight multitool. This will occupy your hands.
A battery comprised of quantum resonating crystal is implanted in your abdomen. It humms in tune with the resonating frequency of your current location in spacetime.
A highly advanced quantum electron miner is installed under your diaphram, and it uses the basic micropressure of your breathing to pierce through quantum foam and generate entropy in electrons.
A set of micro-macerators line a tube in your chest, running to an artificial digestive system in your abdomen. It can efficiently convert most biological matter into a nutrient-dense gel.
